quote: The lone wolf is a visionary who can see what others cannot.
author: Anonymous

quote: In a world of sheep, be the lion.
author: Unknown

quote: Silence is the best response to a fool.
author: Imam Ali

quote: The man who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs
